alert.note: Alert for Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Rockingham; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:28PM EST until January 29 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Augusta, Highland, and Rockingham Counties in Virginia including the central Virginia Blue Ridge, and Pendleton County in West Virginia. * WHEN...From noon Friday to midnight EST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Rockingham; Western Highland
